author: jerenkrantz
msg: Resolve issue #2102 by adding the right dependencies for javahl bindings.
(javahl-javah): Add $(javahl_java_DEPS) to the dependencies for javahl-javah
so that the javahl-javah target will work independently.
dependencies for libsvnjavahl so that the libsvnjavahl target will work
Note that this is different than what is in the issue tracker as adding
the simple targets is incorrect as make will assume that 'javahl-java'
and 'javahl-javah' must always be rebuilt - instead, use their dependencies.
(This follows the convention of the other library dependencies.)

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  get paths canonicalized correctly.
(svn_fs_base__lock):  canonicalize the incoming absolute fs path.
(svn_fs_bdb__locks_get):  edge-case: don't append a trailing slash to '/'.

author: philip
msg: (svn_wc_cleanup): Introduce a subpool and do timestamp repair.
(prop_time_behaviour): Add cmd parameter to allow cleanup testing.
(timestamp_behaviour): Call text_time_behaviour, test cleanup as well
